mapper.select: select study_num, m.member_num, study_title, study_intro, study_area, study_people, study_regist_date, study_ing, study_depart, study_contact from tbl_member m join tbl_study s on m.member_num = s.member_num order by study_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_study(study_num, member_num, study_title, study_intro, study_area, study_people, study_ing, study_depart, study_contact) values(#{studyNum}, #{memberNum}, #{studyTitle}, #{studyIntro}, #{studyArea}, #{studyPeople}, #{studyIng}, #{studyDepart}, #{studyContact})
mapper.select: select study_num, study_title, study_intro, study_area, study_people, study_depart, study_regist_date, member_nickname, study_contact, m.member_num, member_nickname from tbl_member m join tbl_study s on study_num = #{studyNum} and m.member_num = s.member_num
select study_regist_date from tbl_study order by study_regist_date desc
